pkgmetadata.longdescription: Build and Tune Several Models // Frequently one needs a convenient way to build and tune, several models in one go.The goal is to provide a number of convenience functions useful in machine learning applications. It provides the ability to build,tune and obtain predictions of several models in one function. The models are built using 'caret' functions with easier to read syntax. Kuhn(2014)arXiv:1405.6974v14. Kuhn(2008)doi10.18637/jss.v028.i05. Chambers,J.M.(1992)doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0053143. Wilkinson,G.N. and Rogers, C. E. (1973)doi:10.2307/2346786.
